description:
http://anidb.net/ch25718 [Lucifer Hawk], probably of Category I. Intelligent, polite, and cooperative; not interested in any fight, communicates peacefully with http://anidb.net/ch25714 [AMP] members.
Informs http://anidb.net/ch13443 [Katsumi Liqueur] about the role her father http://anidb.net/ch25713 [Gigelf Liqueur] had played in terms of the Lucifer Hawks` presence in this dimension.
name: Carua Se
